settings.copyright_text: *These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease and are not for use by or sale to persons under the age of 18.

settings.title: Quality Guarantee
settings.text: All of our products are THC free, meaning there is no psychoactive effect or risk of failing a drug screening. You will not get “high” from any of our products.  We use the highest quality CBD and organic herbs in each formulation. We are committed to offering the most effective and natural product on the market.

settings.subtitle: Our Heritage
settings.title: Women Owned & Operated Since 2011
settings.text: Jennifer and Kelly have over 20 years' of combined experience treating people in pain. As founders of one of the first orthopedic spas in California, their focus has been helping people feel good in their body through a holistic combination of skilled bodywork and herbal body care products. They have treated over 50,000 people in their clinic, Vital Body Therapy, with the mission of helping clients discover the benefits of treating their pain naturally.

settings.title: Sign up and save
settings.text: Subscribe to get special offers, free giveaways, and once-in-a-lifetime deals.

settings.title: Does your CBD Cream interact with any drugs?
settings.text: If you have concerns over drug interactions, we recommend that you consult with your physician prior to use as we are not qualified to give medical direction or advice.

settings.title: Are your products made using full spectrum, broad spectrum or CBD isolate?
settings.text: Technically, they are made with broad spectrum because we use a hemp distillate that has the THC removed (but preserves the other cannabinoids, terpenes, etc.). A large majority of our clients have expressed concerns about there being ANY THC in the product, even if it’s below 0.3% (the legal definition of agricultural hemp) which is the case for all of our products. We use an organic hemp derived CBD which contains zero THC. Until recently there was no real discernment between the terms, however, the conversation has started to include the term “broad spectrum.” Previously, broad and full spectrum were used pretty interchangeably…probably because the average consumer wouldn’t care about that subtle difference. However, now that there is more information about CBD being made available, the distinction has become relevant.

settings.title: What is the difference between the 200 mg and 800 mg CBD cream?
settings.text: The only difference between our 200 mg and 800 mg cream is the amount of CBD in each container. They are both effective for muscle, joint and arthritis pain relief. Our 800 mg extra strength cream allows for more relief in areas with extreme pain and discomfort.

settings.title: What is the difference between the retail cream and the massage cream?
settings.text: Our retail CBD Cream was formulated for acute and localized pain and inflammation. Our massage cream was formulated for use by massage, spa and medical professionals for an all over body massage. In the 1.5 oz jar of CBD cream, you would be getting roughly 133 mg of CBD per ounce whereas with the massage cream you would be getting 50 mg CBD per ounce, so the retail CBD cream is much more potent for spot treatment.

settings.title: Do your products contain THC?
settings.text: No. All of our products are made using an organic, hemp derived CBD containing zero THC. Our supplier provides a C.O.A. or Certificate of Analysis for every batch of hemp extract so we can be sure it is THC free and organic. We also have all of our products tested at SC Labs in Santa Cruz and post our C.O.A.’s on our website for full transparency.

settings.title: What is the shelf life for your products?
settings.text:
The approximate shelf life for ourproducts are as follows:

9 months: Massage Cream

12 months: Restore: CBD + Turmeric Tincture

14 months: Retail CBD Cream, Extra Strength CBD Cream, CBD Sport Balm, Extra Strength CBD Sport Balm, Luminous: CBD Facial Oil & Radiance: CBD Body Oil

18 months: CBD Mineral Bath Soak

settings.title: Are your ingredients certified organic?
settings.text: All of our pain-relieving herbs and essential oils are certified organic. We post all of our ingredient decks on our website beneath each product description for your convenience.

settings.title: What is the recommended dosage for your products?
settings.text: It really depends on you and what brings you relief. For our topicals, we recommend starting with a small application (maybe a dime or nickel size dab) and apply as needed. Sometimes one application will provide relief and other times you may require multiple applications. It's really up to you! CBD is non-addictive, non-psychoactive (THC free) and non-toxic so there really is no limit to the amount you apply. With regard to our tincture, the suggested serving size is 40mg (one dropperful), however, we recommend starting with half a dropperful (20mg) to see how it affects you. CBD tinctures may cause drowsiness in some individuals, so we also recommend testing out the dosage in the evening, if possible.

settings.title: Will I fail a drug test if I use your products
settings.text: Our line is made using an organic hemp derived CBD which is THC free so will not show up on a drug test. Every batch of hemp extract we receive from our suppler comes with a C.O.A. or Certificate of Analysis so we can be sure it is THC free and organic.

settings.title: What if it does not work for me?
settings.text: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, we would be happy to refund you according to our refund policy which is stated on our website. All we ask if that you donate the product(s) to someone who can benefit from it/them.

settings.title: Is your CBD Cream safe while breastfeeding or pregnant?
settings.text: We recommend consulting with your physician if you are pregnant or breastfeeding prior to using our products.

settings.title: Does your CBD Sport Balm have the same lavender scent as your CBD Cream?
settings.text: All of our topicals are made using the same formulation of herbs and essential oils chosen for their therapeutic properties. There may be some slight differences in the scent of the products due to the other ingredients, however, the scent profile is very similar with each of our products.

settings.title: How do you use this cream to help with sleep?
settings.text: CBD has been known to have a calming, sedative effect. We recommend using a CBD topical on your temples, neck and shoulders, and/or our Restore: CBD + Turmeric Tincture before bed to promote a restful night sleep.

settings.title: Do you deliver outside of the U.S.?
settings.text: Currently no. But we expect this to change in the future as CBD regulations begin to loosen worldwide.

settings.title: I am an industry professional. How do I qualify for wholesale pricing?
settings.text: Please call or email us and we would be happy to assist you with setting up a wholesale account.

settings.title: Can this product be used on a sunburn?
settings.text: Yes. CBD is known for its anti-inflammatory properties and can be beneficial for skin conditions such as sunburns. However, we always recommend that you consult with your physician when using a new product.

settings.title: Are your products gluten free?
settings.text: Yes

settings.title: Are your products safe to use on animals (like dogs)?
settings.text: Our products are made using all-natural ingredients, without the use of preservatives, additives, fillers or synthetic fragrances so should be safe for use on animals. However, we would advise that you use products specifically formulated for animals and keep your products for yourself.

settings.title: How much of the CBD Cream should I use per application?
settings.text: This really depends on you! While we suggest starting with a small dollop the size of a dime or nickel, CBD is non-addictive, non-psychoactive (THC free) & non-toxic so there really is no limit to the amount you apply.

settings.title: Do you have current lab reports for your products?
settings.text: We test all of our products at SC Labs in Santa Cruz and post our C.O.A.’s or Certificate of Analysis on our website for full transparency.

settings.title: I need help with my subscription. What should I do?
settings.text: You should receive a unique log in to the customer portal in your order confirmation email so you can access your account to make changes to your delivery schedule, payment information and shipping address. You can also log in on the lower left side of our website under where it says My Account.

settings.title: How do you buy more than one item at a time?
settings.text: You will need to select the option ‘Add to Cart’ rather than ‘Buy Now’ to purchase multiple items in the same order.

settings.title: My package has not arrived. What should I do?
settings.text: Due to the Covid-19virus and severe weather patterns, there have been numerous shipping delays with all carriers including the US Postal Service and UPS. Although we do our best to fulfill orders in a timely matter (within 1-2 days of placing your order, excluding weekends), we cannot guarantee delivery once we hand off your order to the shipping company. We strongly advise that you purchase Route insurance at check out which will cover the cost to replace your order should anything happen.

settings.title: I am local. Can I pick up my order rather than having it shipped?
settings.text: Yes. We do allow customers to pick up their orders. You will need to email us once you have placed the order so we can notate the order. Please include your name, order number and the best contact number to reach you at.

settings.title: Do you offer electronic gift cards?
settings.text: Yes. They are available in for purchase on our Gift Card page in denominations of $25, $50,$75 and $100: https://vitalbodytherapeutics.com/products/gift-card?variant=33307183874184.
Free shipping
Hassle-free returns
